comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label for rooms that can only be viewed, typically in a filtering or search interface. It appears as a filter option on pages like the Home page's Filter section, allowing users to select view-only rooms. Translators should aim for an accurate and descriptive phrase that maintains the intended accessibility and functionality of the UI component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Yalnız baxın' does not accurately convey the meaning of 'View-only'. It literally translates to 'Only look' or 'Just watch'.  'View-only' implies a permission level or access restriction. A more appropriate translation would convey that meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Sərfəli baxış' (for read-only access) or 'Təkrar baxış' (for viewing-only access) or a phrase that expresses read-only permissions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Bulgarian translation "Само за преглед" is a literal translation of 'for review' and doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'View-only'. 'View-only' implies read-only access, preventing modification. A better translation would convey this restriction.

The German translation "Schreibgeschützt" while technically meaning 'write-protected' or 'read-only', doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of "View-only" in the context of rooms. It implies a technical protection, rather than simply a permission.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Nur-Anzeigen" or "Nur lesen" to better reflect the intended meaning of 'View-only'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Միայն դիտելու համար" while literal, doesn't quite capture the nuance of "View-only." It translates to 'Only for viewing' which is slightly verbose and not the most natural phrasing for a technical setting. A more concise and accurate translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Դիտելու ռեժիմ" (Ditelu rezhim) – which translates to 'View mode' or simply "Դիտելու համար" (Ditelu hamar) - 'For viewing'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Apenas ver" is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'View-only'. It sounds a bit awkward in Portuguese. A more natural translation would convey the idea of restriction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Possíveis sugestões: 'Somente visualização', 'Visualização apenas', 'Apenas para visualização'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Somente visualização' is understandable, it's not the most natural or idiomatic translation for 'View-only' in a software context. It's a very literal translation and might sound awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Apenas visualização', 'Visualização apenas', or 'Somente leitura' (if it strictly means read-only access).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Просмотр" while technically meaning 'viewing' or 'view', doesn't fully capture the meaning of "View-only". It lacks the restrictive aspect. 'View-only' implies read-only access, not just any viewing.

The Slovak translation 'Iba prezeranie' while understandable, isn't the most natural or precise translation of 'View-only'. It literally means 'Only viewing'. A better translation would be something like 'Len na zobrazenie' or 'Výhradne na zobrazenie'.

The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation "Само-за-преглед" does not accurately convey the meaning of "View-only." It literally translates to something like "Self-review" or "For self-viewing," which is not the intended meaning.  'View-only' indicates a permission level where users can only see, but not modify, information.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more appropriate translation would be something like "Само-гледање" (Samo-gledanje), "Само за гледање" (Samo za gledanje), or "Само приказ" (Samo prikaz).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Samo-za-pregled" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "View-only." It's a literal combination of words rather than a natural Serbian equivalent.
The Turkish translation "Sadece görüntüleme" is a literal translation of 'View-only' but doesn't fully capture the intended meaning in a user interface context. It's slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Yalnızca görüntüleme" or "Sadece okunabilir" for a more natural and clearer meaning in a UI context.  "Salt okunur" is also a good option.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Chỉ xem" is understandable, it's a somewhat literal translation and doesn't fully capture the nuance of "View-only." A more natural and idiomatic translation might be better.
While '仅查看' (jin chakan) is a literal translation of 'View-only', it lacks the nuance of permission restriction implied by 'View-only' in the context of rooms. It simply means 'only view'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 考虑使用更精确的翻译，例如“仅读” (jin du) 或 “查看权限” (chakanquanxian)，以传达仅查看的权限限制。
